mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT BRANDNAME FROM projectDB.brand WHERE IDX = A.brand) AS BRAND, A.wineKind, A.wineKrName, A.wineEnName, (SELECT countryname FROM projectDB.country WHERE IDX = A.country) AS country, (SELECT grapename FROM projectDB.grape WHERE IDX = A.GRAPE) AS grape, A.price,A.img, A.createTM, C.foodName FROM projectDB.wine A LEFT OUTER JOIN projectDB.wineFood B ON A.idx = B.wineIdx INNER JOIN projectDB.food C ON B.foodIdx = C.idx
